Game

Class Region

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Region

  • public class Region
extends java.lang.Object

    Details of all regions

    CLass contains all the fields related to areas on the board as data members,
    a constructor that initializes their values
    and a function placeDefaultMinion() to start the game
    when all players are supposed to put one minion in the areas
    The Shades, The Scours and Dolly Sisters
    and one troubleMarker in each area

    Author:
    Archana

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Region(java.lang.String Name, int Number, int bCost)
      Three parameterized constructor that initializes the name of region, building cost and number according to given parameters and initializes all other data members to 0

      void placeDefaultMinion(java.lang.String color)
      One parameterized function that places the minion of the given color of player in the three default regions to start the game

      • Region

        public Region(java.lang.String Name,
              int Number,
              int bCost)
        Three parameterized constructor that initializes the name of region, building cost and number according to given parameters and initializes all other data members to 0
        Parameters:
        Name - used to initialize data member region name
        Number - used to initialize data member region number
        bCost - used to initialize data member region building cost
